Languages.Language 1: Understands Infernal but can not speak

Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 7 Piercing plus 7 Fire

Other Actions.Action 1: Fire Breath, The Hound exhales a cone of fire, creatures caught in the cone take an Average 21 Fire damage

Abilities.Ability 1: Keen Hearing and Smell, The Hound has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell
Abilities.Ability 2: Pack Tactics, The Hound has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the Hound's allies is within 5ft of the creature
